properties.publicRemarks: Beautifully remodeled mid century home on 5 acres with 2 legal lots in super trendy Joshua Tree. This enchanting hideaway is on two separate legal lots. The west lots comes with a 1950s homestead cabin. Open layout with new mini split AC/heating. High ceilings, recessed lighting, and new floors throughout. Living room and dining area complete with rock faced alcove and wood burning stove. Kitchen boasts new counters, cabinets, sink and appliances. Two spacious bedrooms both with glass sliders that lead to the patio. Bathroom with new vanity, tile and glass shower. Entertain under the milky way on the expansive deck on the quiet starry nights. Garage has been partially remodeled for a work space studio. The natural ambiance is inspiring. These properties are perched high upon Copper Mtn Mesa where you can enjoy panoramic views of the Bullion Mtns, the Little San Bernardino Mtns, and Copper Mtn. Just 1.5 miles to the Copper Mtn hillside for black boulder hiking and adventure trails. Open space government land borders the property on two sides. 12 miles to the JT strip with organic cafes, restaurants, bars, and the farmers market. Additional Parcel with cabin APN: 0632-211-29-0000. 17 miles to the Joshua Tree National Monument main gate where about 3 million tourists visit annually. Hot vacation area. Joshua Tree has become a hip haven for many celebrities', artists, and musicians. 46 miles to Palm Springs. 139 miles to Los Angeles. Don't Wait! - Call Now!
